title: House with a Apartment
details:
1 km to wattala town
Near to Hekitta Church & Palliyawatta church (100 m)
There are two temples near to house (100 m)
There are two supermarkets near by Arpico & Food city (500m)
Can reach to colombo within 15 - 20 min (via wattala or Mattakkuliya road)
There are recognize schools around
